meanings.sent1: She is so dupable that she believed the fake email was from a prince.
meanings.sent2: The salesman targeted the dupable customers with his false promises.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was so simple, even the most dupable audience member saw through it.
meanings.sent4: His dupable nature made him an easy target for online scammers.
meanings.sent5: The dupable child eagerly handed over all his toys to the stranger.

meanings.sent1: Being dupable, she fell for the same prank twice.
meanings.sent2: The con artist took advantage of the dupable old man's trust.
meanings.sent3: Her friends played a harmless joke on her, knowing she was dupable.
meanings.sent4: The dupable student believed the fake news without questioning it.
meanings.sent5: His dupable nature led him to believe in superstitions and myths.
